title: Option to turn off skins
body: Some skins are really distracting and some even lag me at times, I suggest an option to turn off skins.

replies.body:
The problem with this is that having a skin isn't just a personal thing it is also a way of showing your enemies and allies you are confident with that champ, and spreading the visual image of that champ that you like most, (for example i really like Masked shaco but hate the regular shaco so when i play him i want everyone to see the shaco i think is best) and there is no point in spending almost $10 on a skin that only you can see, you might as well just turn on all the skins in the game files so then you have them all but no one else can see them, Riot would suddenly stop making money and the game would end.

and with the distraction and lag, everyone in the game can see the skins too therefore everyone will be distracted the same, and everyone has to load the skins, so unless everyone else is lagging too because of it, its probably your machine that is the problem.
There'd still be the loading screen and   some points are true but you still should have the right to turn off annoying skins. (May not annoy others)
